scripts.build-all: napi build --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk && napi build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk npm/darwin-arm64 && napi build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk npm/darwin-x64 && napi build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk npm/linux-x64-gnu
scripts.build:mac: napi build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk npm/darwin-arm64 && napi build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --platform --release --cargo-cwd sdk npm/darwin-x64
scripts.postbuild:linux: npm run postbuild && cd npm/linux-x64-gnu && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild:mac: npm run postbuild && cd npm/darwin-arm64 && npm run postbuild && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm run postbuild && rm *-e
